title: Enlive Manager
description: Enlive Manager is a crm used to track and scheudle jobs, manage clients and send invoces. This is my first large project i have completed outside university.

title: DnD Initiative
description: DnD Initiative is an application used to manage users initiative and track their inventories. This started as a local project that tracks users inititive but is expanding to cover the player's item invetory.

title: Portfolio
description: This is the website you are currently viewing used as a testing ground to practice my CSS layout and animations.
